name: Square Yumemiru Stool
description: A traditional stool made from Yumemiru Wood. Its surface has been dyed using special methods from Inazuma, and it has lovely, bright metals as ornamentation.\nAll the residents of Hanamizaka will tell you that sitting on this kind of stool when dining boosts your appetite. Could it be that furniture made from Yumemiru Wood has undiscovered mystical properties?
